document.docAuthor: Alipanah, Helen, Yakovlev, Roman, Falsafi, Hossein, Witt, Thomas & Saldaitis, Aidas
document.docTitle: Holcocerus gloriosa subsp. mesopotamica Watkins & Buxton 1921

bibRefCitation.author: Watkins, H. T. G. & Buxton, R. A.
bibRefCitation.refString: Watkins, H. T. G. & Buxton, R. A. (1921) Moths of Mesopotamia and N. W Persia. Part H. Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society, 28, 184 - 186.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holcocerus gloriosus Stgr.
, mesopotamicus , Watkins & Buxton, 1921 , J. Bombay Nat. Hist. Soc. 28: 86.

LT: Mesopotamian: Kut, Amara [ Kut el Amara , 125 km SE Baghdad , S Iraq ]. Type material ( holotype ) in BMNH
.

Distribution in Iran .
S and SW Iran ( Fig. 31F ).

Host plants.
Although a single specimen in HMIM was collected
on
Vachellia nilotica
(L.) P. J. H. Hurter & Mabb in
Hormozgan Province (Minab); however, it does not seem to be a specific host plant for
H. gloriosa mesopotamica
.
Comment. The locality “Heran” remained unknown for the authors, hence it was not included in the distribution map ( Fig. 31F ).
